content:
ImageSelectType Enum

Definition

Specifies when the visual style selects a different multiple-image file to draw an element.

In this Article

public enum ImageSelectType
Inheritance
Object
ValueType
System.Enum
ImageSelectType

Remarks

A visual style can define up to five multiple-image files for an element. These image files are specified by the FilenameProperty values FilenameProperty through FilenameProperty. The ImageSelectType values indicate when the visual style selects a different image file to draw the element.

The ImageSelectType values represent the return values of the GetEnumValue method when it is called with an argument value of System.Windows.Forms.VisualStyles.EnumProperty.

Fields

Dpi

Image file changes are based on dots per inch (DPI) settings.
None

The image file does not change.
Size

Image file changes are based on size settings.
